definition: final account/to calculate the final bill/fig. to draw up plans to deal with sth
to decide/to determine/to execute (sb)/(of a dam etc) to breach or burst/definitely/certainly
to regard as/to figure/to calculate/to compute

sentences.english: We are committed to carrying out settlement audit for construction engineering and calculating the construction cost impartially and fairly.
sentences.chinese: 對建設工程進行決算審計，公正公平地確定工程造價。

sentences.english: Unifying all accounting subjects of science and technology expenditure.
sentences.chinese: 二是儘量統一各類科技計劃的經費預決算科目。

sentences.english: How are you an asset to a company's balance sheet?
sentences.chinese: 怎麼能把自己釀成企業決算表中的資產呢？

sentences.english: Construction Project Budgeting and Final Accounting Specialty should undergo reforms.
sentences.chinese: 基建工程預決算專業的教學改革應與時俱進。

sentences.english: How could the regular annual accounting exercise have overlooked such a large chunk of China's output?
sentences.chinese: 常規的年度決算何以會忽略中國如此龐大的一塊產出？

sentences.english: Topics of instruction include everything from balance sheets to computer networks.
sentences.chinese: 授課包括從決算表到計算機網絡的一切內容。

sentences.english: They're also classified separately on your financial statements 4.
sentences.chinese: 他們也在你的財務決算中分屬不同的類別。

sentences.english: Participate in the procedure of final acceptance and final settlement.
sentences.chinese: 全程參與最終驗收和最終決算。

sentences.english: Contractor shall submit final account report after construction accepted by owner.
sentences.chinese: 承包商在工程所有者同意後應提交最終決算報告。

sentences.english: The Finical Department supervises the finical operation and provides finical insurance for running and developing of the Institute.
sentences.chinese: 負責編制預決算，監管財務運行，提供財政保障。

sentences.english: Since the emergence of the democratic ethos of modern economy, budget and final accounts demonstrates the necessity of democracy.
sentences.chinese: 由於現代經濟民主思潮的出現，預決算民主非常必要。

sentences.english: The concrete matters concerning the compilation of the draft final accounts shall be arranged by the department of finance under the State Council.
sentences.chinese: 編制決算草案的具體事項，由國務院財政部門部署。

definition: to claim a credit against/tax reduction
(of a sum of money etc) receivable
Sanxing or Sanhsing township in Yilan county 宜蘭縣|宜兰县[Yi2 lan2 xian4], Taiwan
(of a document) not bearing a name/unregistered (financial securities etc)/bearer (bond)/secret (ballot etc)/anonymous/unattributed (remarks)/(of a check) payable to the bearer
to verify accounting records/also written 對帳|对帐[dui4 zhang4]
